website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful and easy-to-use set of decorations at a quality price point.
pros: Gold foil letters pop on light blue banner
Kit sits at a valuable price point
Clear instructions make for easy set up
Quality paper tassels are thick and full
Durable enough to be reused at future parties
cons: Easy to DIY, but a bit time consuming

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office baby shower
customer_reviews.text: This worked out perfectly for a surprise office baby shower! It was nice to be able to have one entire package of decorations ready to go after the mom-to-be left the office. The tassels took about 10 min to twist and assemble beforehand, but the other fans and banner took about 15 min for 2 people to assemble and set up.
customer_reviews.author: CraftMom

customer_reviews.title: Overall Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I should purchase this because of one of the reviews saying the product was "misleading" but I took a chance since my sister in law really liked the banner. Turned out to be better than we expected and everyone complimented on them. I helped my brother put all the decorations up for the party and had no issues. I just wish there was tape or something included to hang the strings with. Overall I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Co worker loved them, beautiful decorations
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were adorable! My coworker was so surprised at her shower and she loved everything. She packed it all up and took it all home to save.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Great shower decorations!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love these decorations! Every piece made our baby shower decorating perfect! They were made of strong quality materials and very affordable. They are so strong that they can be reused! I highly recommend these decorations and this company. I received them within 3 days and was very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: denaq

customer_reviews.title: Last minute hostess...saved!!
customer_reviews.text: The This proved to be a lovely package, many of my guest commented on how nice they were! In my haste, I didn't realize the table cloth WAS NOT included but everything looked beautiful without it. The banner is so sturdy, really everything is made well. Well worth the money, would buy from this company again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of decorations for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Party pieces were easy to assemble. Used for small outdoor BBQ/baby shower for 2nd baby, a boy. Very happy with this purchase. Would recommend for DIY party to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: ... I ordered this thinking it might not be that great, but it was
customer_reviews.text: You know I ordered this thinking it might not be that great, but it was. It made the difference in my home for the baby shower I gave and it was really great. In fact there were so many decorations I couldn't use them all. It made the event really festive. I would order them again for another party in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Del Monte

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby showers
customer_reviews.text: This got the job done for the baby shower. Didn’t have to make my own decorations at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kat P.

customer_reviews.title: The decorations were cute— they didn’t include some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The decorations were cute— they didn’t include some of the pop up lanterns and the banner didn’t have the S on it. Ofcourse I found out the hard way the day of the shower.. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, really cute, good price
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a virtual baby shower (sent 1 to myself and 1 to the mom to be). Good quality for a good price, you get a good amount of decorations. Was easy to assemble. It came with instructions, but I didn't see them until I already put it together and was still really easy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute Decorations
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to assemble! Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Danette Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great value for the money! They were the only decorations we needed to buy for the baby shower, besides balloons! Really good quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: MomToTwo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It’s supposed to have gold letters with oh boy, but i received the letters HYCVU. I don’t know what I’m supposed to do with it!! The shower is tomorrow!!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to put together and I was pleased with the sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: great pack of decorations
customer_reviews.text: this was a great purchase. i actually had two back to back weekends with showers for baby boys and these held up well in between.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Raskin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and looks great for a baby shower.
customer_reviews.text: The it's a boy banner was high quality, but be prepared for the letters to move around. Overall, it was easy and quick to set up for a nicely decorated baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Anjela

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for small budget baby shower party
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for small budget baby shower party!! I bought this for my sister’s surprise baby shower party. She loved it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Imjuthy

customer_reviews.title: Enough to decorate one whole room!
customer_reviews.text: The tassel garland was a little silly looking but overall these decorations were great.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Ours did not come out like this picture☹️
customer_reviews.text: Too much assembly required. Ours did not come out like this picture☹️
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Kaye Horton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: The decorations were at hit at our office “baby shower lunch.” Just as described!
customer_reviews.author: CathDevine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect package for throwing the best baby shower. Can not tell you how well it went over with all involved in the party. Will buy again for future baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Myford

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product was great for the money and what we received. Worked well for decorating. It was also nice to receive an email requesting feedback on our service due to issues that they have had with delivery in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Naglosky

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Decorations!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these decorations for our daughter's baby shower and we were so pleased with the quality. It's so great to get a package like this with matching pieces and they look great! We would recommend these for anyone looking to make a baby shower more festive!
customer_reviews.author: AN TX and NJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun, pretty, allows for some creativity.
customer_reviews.text: This was cute! Lots of fun things to create, easy to do, arrange around the house however you'd like. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Jellico

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We used the decoration for a baby shower party at work. The room looked beautiful and the person was pleasantly surprised. I will definitely buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Begona

customer_reviews.title: super fun and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit, super fun and easy to put up. Great addition to the other decorations I'd purchased.
customer_reviews.author: AudrianaCole

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cigarette smoke
customer_reviews.text: Cute but smells really bad of cigarette smoke!!!! I smelt it as soon as I opened the package!! Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality for price
customer_reviews.text: A little time consuming but overall good for value. The fringed banner wasn’t the best quality once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower decor for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This set worked perfect for my baby shower. Easy to set up, durable, and affordable. We didn’t end up using 3 of the smaller lantern balls and it still turned out great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and quickly was able to decorate for a shower
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Good quality, and a lot of stuff for only $20ish!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We loved these decorations
customer_reviews.text: We loved how easy these were to assemble and were very happy with how they looked. Exactly how the picture shows! Very lovely and we would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: karam abuhasna

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different decorations in the package, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for two baby showers in the same weekend. Held up well for the second shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and enough to decorate at our baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Tara J Winter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the decorations and everyone at the shower did as well!
customer_reviews.author: cutter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Turned out very nice! Even got to pass on the decorations to another family member having a baby boy shower 💙
customer_reviews.author: Clare R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality banner
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality of the sign and the price. It was cute and modern. I didn’t use the accessories and Pom poms but they looked nice too.
customer_reviews.author: ANH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It was all super cute and fun for the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: ... in place and the items were just as expected perfect for my mother’s baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in place and the items were just as expected perfect for my mother’s baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Color was true to photo shown online
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Color was true to photo shown online. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot stuff and very good quality !!! Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My order was incomplete. Only received 4 items: one white paper fan and 2 blue paper spheres + banner.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality, colors are great too. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Noor Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderful for the baby shower I had. Decorations were easy to assemble and looked great!
customer_reviews.author: w. griffin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: Product image is misleading -- it only includes a fraction of the decorations displayed (no tablecloth, string, plates, etc.). I realize it notes that in the details, but why include that in the main image of it doesn't come with the kit? The kit took over an hour to set up, as well, which I didn't expect or account for. Otherwise, product quality was as expected -- fine for one-time use, but won't go with this brand again and would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie c.

customer_reviews.title: Not sold as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as advertised. It did not have the 25 pohoto booth props nor the 7 elephants balloons,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy  with this package of decorations!
customer_reviews.text: Everything received was exactly as expected. The quality was good and everything was easy to put together. We made a beautiful picture backdrop with the decorations in this package!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Shower Decorations for Boy, Elephant Baby Shower Decorations, Set Includes: its a boy Banner, oh boy Balloons,Elephant Garland,Blue,White and Gold Confetti Balloons, Baby boy Party Supplies
feature_bullets: It's A Boy! Welcome the arrival of your little baby boy in style with these adorable elephant baby shower decorations! Our its a boy baby shower decorations feature a blue and gold elephant theme for your party including balloons with confetti, banners and letter balloons. Stay on trend and impress your guests with this adorable elephant themed baby shower decoration set.

These baby boy shower decorations include trendy gold oh boy balloons with a straw to blow them up and a string for hanging. Do not fill the letters with helium. The kit also includes a pre-strung its a boy banner, latex balloons in blue, white and clear with gold confetti, and a blue and gold elephant banner. All banners are made of durable, strong cardstock paper.

Use the oh boy banner and decorations for your pregnancy announcement, gender reveal party, or after for the baby boys nursery decor! The oh boy baby shower decorations are also great for a baby shower backdrop for photos and the balloon letters and elephant decor bring life to the party! Add in a big cake, an oh boy cake topper, party favors, candy, sprinkles, centerpieces and games. Do not use in extreme hot or cold temperatures.

Save time and get all your baby boy baby shower decorations in one place and a package delivered to your door! This bundle of fall baby shower decorations has all the party supplies you need to cover the babyshower for your newborn prince. Our it's boy decorations are simple and easy to set up, are reusable, and are so easy to order.

Our baby shower decorations for boy elephant themed parties are sure to impress your friends and family. The gold foil and blue elephant garland is perfect for both parties and a babies room. Plus, these baby shower boy decorations are they are easy to set up! Watch the listing video for instructions.
